content.question: If an economy is currently in a recessionary gap, which of the following changes would result in an increase in real <math alttext="G D P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>GDP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> in the short run and a decrease in the price level in the long run?

choices.label: The government begins running a budget surplus.
There is an increase in real interest rates.
The government increases income tax rates.
There is an increase in the prices of the economy’s productive resources.
There is an increase in the productivity of the economy’s resources.

content.answer: There is an increase in the productivity of the economy’s resources.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
